website_summaries.verdict: These face paint crayons work well for parties and events that need a simple and un-messy way to apply face paint.
pros: Lots of colors included in this kit
Good value on this product compared to what you can buy in the store
cons: These paint crayons are simple, but do not blend as easily as paints applied with a brush

customer_reviews.title: Bright, bold and colorful!
customer_reviews.text: These face paint crayons are great! They're creamy, easy to use, bright and awesome! These are WAY better quality than the ones you pick up at your local halloween store and a WAY better value! The set comes with 18 matte colors and 6 metalic colors. I am VERY happy with my purchace and would recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Early Summer Kid's Party!
customer_reviews.text: We had a super fun kid's birthday party the other day using the Joyin inflatable guitars, bubbles, and face paint crayons. We also ordered face paint pots from Blue Squid and it was a perfect day!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Work fine with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very sensitive skin. Therefore, I try to plan ahead and get the right makeup product before Halloween. I did a patch test before applying these new crayon product on my skin, and I didn't have any allergic reaction I did try to draw a small part on my face before i exactly started painting a zombie face. It was smooth and so easy to wash off. Extreme crayon pack.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Clean off
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters, ages 3.5 & 7, loved these. I picked up some sensitive baby wipes for cleanup. The girls spent a couple of hours making themselves up, playing, and adding more. My daughter had a very hard time trying to clean them off. Did not come off in the bath even with scrubbing. In the past, I used to make body paint using powdered paint mixed with Joy dish detergent, no water added. I would then bring a bucket of water and rags for easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: My daughter love at first sight
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love at first sight. She has been asking about drawing on her face since the crayon arrived. Good news is that they are not hard to wash off so she can clean up everywhere b4 bed. At first we bought this as a face paint for her to draw since she has reached to an age of leaning colors. i never thought that they can draw on paper as a normal crayons which is cool. I believe there are 6 metallic colors that glow on surface which is another plus. This is a very great product. Definitely recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set of vibrant face crayons
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how vibrant each colors were and how easy it was to glide onto your face or body. Taking off was also a breeze. It is a great value; in addition to getting one for my son, I also made small packets of 4 to 5 crayons and snuck them in party favor bags for kids. The solid colors are have more staying power while the glittery ones can be smudge-prone but overall these are lots of fun for your kids and you!
customer_reviews.author: Andy S.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: We Use as Bath Crayons!
customer_reviews.text: We use as bath crayons as well as face and body paint. Some of the colors are more vibrant than others. They draw on my “plastic” tub very well, much better than actual bath crayons. To clean off I use a soapy cloth. In addition, the “paper” around the crayon is actually foil and it doesn’t dissentigrate in water. Keep in mind, these are crayons and not for detailed face painting. My 2 year old loves to draw lines all over himself to make himself a tiger.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ojeda

customer_reviews.title: The colors don't stay on the skin at all and ...
customer_reviews.text: The colors don't stay on the skin at all and they smudge all over. Hard to apply as well.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Easy solution with plenty of color options
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for facepainting! My girls face painted other kids and this was an easy solution over the paint brushes. We used baby wipes to remove. Clean up quick from surfaces though, it is very hard to remove if a crayon was stepped on while on white tile 🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: that's what she said

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WASH OFF FOR WEEKS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this (wife writing review) to make our pregnancy announcement. We wrote “loading” on my tunmy etc and it was very cute. Well it was cute that day. It is now almost ONE MONTH LATER and it does not come off!!! My stomach still says loading! I wanted to do this for monthly progress announcements but I guess not!
customer_reviews.author: David Ishmael

customer_reviews.title: So cool!No mess
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for kids! It’s very easy to use. It’s quick, it’s mess free, and it’s creamy. Blue works the best. Some colors are not visible but it’s absolutely wonderful for a start. Unless you want to win a face paint competition for perfection, this is a must have for a casual play day!
customer_reviews.author: Dejawooh

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the purple!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: goes on super easy with vibrant color Washes off with warm water or in a shower Can least through hours or sweating Easy to peel to get to more of the crayon Case clicks shut tightly, almost waterproof tight Cons: The purple leaves a pink is color on your face for a few hours after removal The case is to long to really fit easily into a bag The case is thin it can crack easily Theres no sharpener to bring your crayons back to a point to draw with Personally didn't see a big difference between metallic and regular after its applied to skin
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Carnival Ready
customer_reviews.text: We used these for a school carnival, and they were excellent!! Older students did the painting, and they were perfect for the older the kids to use. Plus, they lasted most of the night. Over 250 students got their faces painted, and we didnt even use up half of each one. They were the best purchase, and we will be using them again for our next carnival!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were creamier
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughters birthday party. We have used them a few times and I really like them! They stay on well but aren't difficult to wash off, and they are smooth and easy to use. My only complaint is that I wish they were a little creamier so I could easily cover a larger area of her face, but over think they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality and they do not apply to the skin!
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst quality face paints I've ever tried. They arrived with most of them cracked or the tops broken off. I decided to try them anyway since I was short on time to get different paints. Some fell apart when I picked them up, some were super waxy and just about disintegrated when I tried to apply. Another was so firm it wouldn't apply at all and the gold foil was stuck to it. I would definitely NOT recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Darlyn

customer_reviews.title: Prefer paint
customer_reviews.text: SOME colors were a little difficult to color on my kids faces. Specifically the white. My son was a vampire and I had hell trying to make his face look pale, but of course we are black and a little harder to get there. lol The golden brown was a little difficult as well, but again it was his skin the blended with the color. The black was perfect and did everything I needed it to do. A nose and whiskers!! If you have a choose purchase face paint instead.
customer_reviews.author: Porsha

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough for kids to use and easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for a slumber party activity. The second/third graders painted each other and did an amazing job. I provided baby wipes for cleanup and they were able to do everything on their own. Application and cleanup was easy and the colors were bright. I bought with another face paint kit. The kids seemed to prefer these crayons since they made it easy to create more precisely.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of broken ones
customer_reviews.text: Several of the crayons were broken upon arrival. you can see in the picture as soon as I opened it I could see the tips were broken. But it was even worse once I opened the package and started trying to use the crayons several of them were broken in different areas making some of the crayons completely unusable because they were tiny little pieces. No time to return them as we needed to use them today.
customer_reviews.author: C. Elley

customer_reviews.title: Ok but arrived melted
customer_reviews.text: These were nice would have been nicer if they didnt arrive half melted but we are doing our best to make it work. They come off very easy but so far dont seem to stain or leave too much of a mess just wish they weren't so melted and disfigured. Slightly disappointed but this was our first attempt at something like this product. Probably wouldnt get again and look for something more to suit our needs. But not a bad price to experiment and know not to repurchase. It didnt stay on very well and wiped off almost too easy. Its an ok product
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Washes off easily
customer_reviews.text: It washes off easily - but smudges very easily as well. For the price and considering I use this for my daughter who is only 2 for fun.. it worked well for us. If you want more professional paints maybe try a different one.
customer_reviews.author: RVGAVF84

customer_reviews.title: as described
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived quickly & was exactly as pictured & described. The colors are varied & were easy to apply with deep full color coverage. They also were easily removed with little effort under soap & water. Another pleasant surprise was the quality plastic case the crayons came in VS a standard cardboard box. I enthusiastically endorse this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Peczi Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever used  on my face!
customer_reviews.text: Easy on, Easy Off. Great quality and very vibrant. Stays on a long time without having to reapply (as long as you don't touch it, of course). It was smooth, an excellent and ample supply in each crayon with a good point. It just doesn't get any better than this for face paints!
customer_reviews.author: meregoddess

customer_reviews.title: Little pieces everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh little pieces everywhere! They came with 6 tips Broken so I knew we would need to be extra cautious with application, little pieces or tips fall off everywhere as you apply, the colors also don’t blend well so doing precise transitions between colors is nearly impossible. They’re a wreck! Never again!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rose

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a super artist, but my kids love to have their faces painted. I figured these would be easier to handle than something requiring a paint brush. They work great! All the shades show up well. (My kids are all fair-skinned.) They have had no adverse effects (even on my youngest daughter, who is allergic to almost all "play make-up" and most sunscreens). They wash off fine in the shower. Lots of fun! Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my first grader to use as a class project. He sold face paintings. They worked great and were easy for his small hands to use. They do come off fairly easily if you wipe them off within the first couple hours. Leave them on any longer and they are on for days.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves doing face paint with these at the art studio here so when I saw these I had to get them for her. She loves them and has drawn many things on her own face and her siblings faces. The only thing that I don't like is that it can be very hard to wash off, especially for a child and they are banned from putting them in their eye brows any more because it's just too difficult to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 10 year old who is big time into self expression right now and she loves them. It’s been fun watching her create different designs and paint her siblings faces as well. I plan to order more and I’m looking for stencils. Came 2 days before quoted and in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: LolaLorito

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Colors, Hard to remove from skin.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of colors and the kids love them. However, they are very difficult to remove from the skin. Lotion helps dissolve them off. Sometimes you can see remnants for a day or two afterwards depending how heavy it is put on. Also, it is hard to close if you open it up upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great value/selection in colors
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her friends loved these face/body paint crayons. So far, they have held up, tops and body of each crayon have not cracked or chipped during application. Highly recommend purchase/great price and value and lots of assorted choice colors.
customer_reviews.author: R.Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Especially for the price. Some of the tips had broken off and that was annoying but the colors are vibrant and easy to use and blend colors. It was a bit of a challenge to remove but overall I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Melts easily.
customer_reviews.text: The colors, variety and container are great. Now, the crayons start melting in my hands when I was using it on my kid's face and there were a few "crumbles" here and there when I finished. I'm not sure if I'll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Corine

customer_reviews.title: Easy for amateurs
customer_reviews.text: For an amateur face painter (mom with little kids) these were easy to use and had great results. We’ve dressed to impress for costume parties and Halloween this past year.
customer_reviews.author: Kel_Tex

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to use then I thought they would be. Can be used to color large area or for detail.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Micka

customer_reviews.title: Good concept bad product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use on my face for Halloween. I had bought this instead of regular paint because I thought it wouldn’t be messy and the color selection was good. The crayons are pigmented when used in small one stroke swipes. Didn’t not show up well when I tried tk draw shapes and stuff on my face very hard to color in and pigmentation was lacking. Would not buy a agin. Spend the extra bucks and get the regular face paint.
customer_reviews.author: Aleesha

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I got a bad batch or what but these were pretty dry, difficult to rub on and blend. The Black was so faint it was more a charcoal grey and the white did not cover well(and my son is already pale). I bought these because the reviews said they were vibrant. Not the case for here. Dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and the tips on the majority of these were already broken. They do blend relatively easily and clean up easier than regular face paint--they also smear and almost melt from the heat of your hand.
customer_reviews.author: BlueFlamingo

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy! Many colors!
customer_reviews.text: So fun! Has been a source of excitement for my 4 year old, during Stay at Home Orders. Super easy, fun, and easy to clean up. We've done so many animal faces and always cures boredom and puts a smile on her face!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs*MamaA

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We were doubtful about the quality because the price was so cheap for 24 colors, but these worked very well! We used them to do painting recreations and although the coverage is not 100%, it was very good!
customer_reviews.author: lj

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It was like trying to draw on skin with a wet crayon. It pulled and dragged at the skin while leaving behind a streaky and semi-translucent color. No amount of coaxing could get a smooth, solid color. They were terrible and I tossed them in the trash after the first day.
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: 4 of the colors came broken. My daughter was so excited to see them that I had to keep them. They are easy to use and remove. But they are too soft so are breaking while coloring too
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these and they are good for hours of fun. My kids have even expanded their painting to include my legs and arms! It comes off easy enough so why not? They’re happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Does not wash off.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I only let my toddler draw all over my arm and not my face. Will be going into the office tomorrow looking like the Incredible Mutant Ninja Hulk. And he'll go to school looking like leprosy.
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: Fine but not great
customer_reviews.text: Pros: washes off easily, colors are acceptable but not vibrant Cons: very brittle - crumble and break easily. Makes it somewhat hard to use and clean up from the floor etc If you’re not using them professionally I think they’re fine.
customer_reviews.author: kaj amir

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this Crayons
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase of the product. Bought this for my daughter couple weeks before. She loves to share with her friends. It's easy to draw and wash out. I bought this set for her friend as part of birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Polaris

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: easy to apply and wash, great colors and the kids have so much fun with them. They do smear easily so not the best on kids younger than 3 (per experience).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: They did exactly what they were supposed to do. The colors showed perfect. It was a little hard to get off with just baby wipes. My kids had to wash off at home with soap and water. Other then that I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kyra

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for kids party :)
customer_reviews.text: These worked great. A lot of different colors to use and they held up well. They even sat in the sun for a while before I realized it and they still worked great.
customer_reviews.author: melissacg

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter ended up scratching the design on her leg by pressing too hard.
customer_reviews.text: It has lots of colors to choose from; some show-up better than others. As far as using; it was hard to cover a lot face. At one time. It would be nice for detail drawing on the face but not to use as an all over coverage
customer_reviews.author: Dawn in texas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay on very long... even with adding primer before and after, but amuses young kids for a while and the colors are vibrant and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Kella Alterio

customer_reviews.title: Complete junk. Won’t draw on faces. Bought this ...
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk. Won’t draw on faces. Bought this based on other reviews and now I’m baffled at what they really ordered because these did not work for us!
customer_reviews.author: TsC

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Great color, great coverage, gentle on skin and super easy removal. Having the crayon is so much easier for my children to use than paint brushes or sponges. I am so happy with the way this product performs
customer_reviews.author: Nonnie0603

customer_reviews.title: Great face painting product
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased these! I brought them to a tailgate party for the kids and all the kids loved them! Parents thought they were great too. Very easy to use and great color options.
customer_reviews.author: A.Weddle

customer_reviews.title: Good times
customer_reviews.text: Quarantine face painting fun! I recommend these for all parents. Have fun, be creative. My kids loved picking designs for me to draw on them. Washed off easy in the shower with soap and water... or sweat. They will sweat off also, if thats a deal breaker...
customer_reviews.author: Tattoo1717

customer_reviews.title: They're ok but arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken tips on a few. Easy to apply and remove. Requested an exchange for product and waiting on new product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: They do the job
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed in these. 6 of the tips were broken off when I opened the package. Other than that the product is fine. They write nicely and can be removed with soap/water or a wet wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: They were trash. Dull and does not work on children of color.
customer_reviews.author: Rukayat Edu

customer_reviews.title: Good value, convenient crayon shape
customer_reviews.text: These were a cheap price and in a convenient crayon-shaped form that wouldn't get my hands messy or require additional application tools, so we bought it. My only complaint is that one of the purple colors stained my face pink until the end of the following day that I had worn it. That's not very professional at work.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria W.

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves to use this and we paint eachothers face. it wipes off easily with water and washcloth. the only drawback is that when they are new the crayons get smashed into the foam and it causes pieces to break off the tip when you first use them
customer_reviews.author: Kryzzle

customer_reviews.title: Bring water;)
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the consistency I could make with these paints. The colors are lovely and that gives me the ability to paint 🎨 whatever I wish. Fun little kit I had to play with. I don’t know who had more fun, the kids or me, painting!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for halloween and I was very impressed with the quality and durability of these face paint pencils. The paint stayed on my face all night and came right off with soap and water. If you're thinking about it, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: OllieBear21

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but beware of staining of darker pigments
customer_reviews.text: Breaks easily upon application and leaves stains with darker colors. But worked for what was needed for.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Was next to impossible to apply, and the white barely showed up at all. We ended up using my everyday makeup. NOT happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jaiden Jacobi

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These were SO FUN! We used them for Halloween and I was able to make some really nifty effects. You can draw straight on or draw and then smear with your finger to fade colors in and out. It can replace conventional makeup pretty well for costume use and saves a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: P31

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this twice and both times they are broken on arrival. I cannot use this for a gift! Super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: neurogeekTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a first-time face painter
customer_reviews.text: If you are not a professional like myself this is the perfect face paint to try, its easy to use just like your drawing on paper and coloring you don't need a special skill.... perfect for first timer.
customer_reviews.author: Royston Jones

customer_reviews.title: Simple crayons but not vivid
customer_reviews.text: It takes several layers for the color to show bright enough. It cleans up easy and with out mess.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fun product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a rainy day. We end up using it rain or not. Salvaged a boring play date and bunches of faces at a 5 yr olds party. Nice product that is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: SJL49

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old enjoys getting her face painted with these. Comes off easily without harsh scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: They all broke the first use.
customer_reviews.text: I mean, yes I can still use them technically, but they crumbled like old dust on the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: So easy and faster.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. So easy and faster. My 12 year old Granddaughter could use without worry of spilling paint. Designs look better with these. Clean off easily,.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Draws on smooth!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make a lion face for my son’s Halloween costume and it went on sooooo smooth! Gentle on his skin, worked so well, and he looked adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at how well these go on the skin and how bright the colors are! I’m so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 paxks of these for our event and they worked well and were easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tablefor7

customer_reviews.title: Good value .
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a creative niece and she's loving them . Too cold and they are harder to use , too hot they smear .
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Buy the palette instead
customer_reviews.text: Easy to remove and clean but application on skin os not that good since you need to apply more pressure on face. Color is not as dark as I want it to be soon as it has been applied.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: We used these at a trunk or treat event so they were used a lot. They lasted throughout many kids but once they werent sharp anymore, they didn't write nearly as well. Not sure if sharpening again would help but the "paint" wasnt as bright and needed a lot more as the crayon went down.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Kids
customer_reviews.text: It's been a long time since I painted a face and enjoyed Halloween. The crayons were easy to put on and easy to take off. I create a Klingon / Kardassian face. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: smlwndr333

customer_reviews.title: Good product but HORRIBLE packaging
customer_reviews.text: Other than finding a repulsive human hair inside the crayon case under the shrink wrap, this was a good purchase. Face paint crayons are easy to use, bright in color, and wash off easily. Three stars because I wanted to vomit seeing someone else’s hair in my item. That’s utterly disgusting. Will skip this seller next time.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Coverage is good, smudges easily, hard to remove
customer_reviews.text: This paint has decent coverage, but it smudges way too easily and is extremely difficult to remove. My son still has a black line all around his face from dressing up like a vampire a week and a half ago.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous user

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Use these at school fun Day. Bought 1 pack for every grade- 90 Kids per grade.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Balanovich

customer_reviews.title: These are a great set. It comes off easily
customer_reviews.text: These are a great set. It comes off easily, doesn't dye your skin and even was ok on my daughter who has sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gore

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These were great. One package lasted a good three hours of face painting (nothing too elaborate), and the crayons were only about 1/3 of the way used. Super easy to apply and wash off. I was the hit of the trunk-or-treat :)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for what it was needed for. Lasts well & came off easy w/soap & water
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Hard to apply but works
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat difficult to spread. The white doesnt cover very well but passed that, the color lasted all night and was very easy to remove with baby whipes
customer_reviews.author: GiseleS

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: My child has great fun with these and much cheaper than the 10-15 dollars every week at the farmers market. Lol. Although we are not as fancy as Lori.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA

customer_reviews.title: Not for little ones
customer_reviews.text: This comes with a ton of colors. I have to press pretty hard for colors other then black to work. With that being said I wouldn’t recommend using this on kids. They’ll complain about the applied pressure needed for application. It does smear a ton. Goes on blurry.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Went on easy and colors stayed on and in place throughout the entire party. Looked great and colors were vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible, not Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay but face paint with a brush would be easier to use. Bold colors just not very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good option for costume makeup or drama makeup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and layer on to make more vibrant. Didn't last beyond maybe 2 hours before needing touch up but well worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: snazzy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but not paint.
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use but because they are crayons and not paint they don’t glide on super easily. I’m still ISO the face paint sticks of my youth.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Galbraith

customer_reviews.title: These were awesome and went on smooth and bright
customer_reviews.text: These were awesome and went on smooth and bright. I though they would be pasty and hard to use but they were so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dubtub

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set for the price. Unfortunately, the "6 metallic colors" were crumbly. I'm guessing they were affected by the heat during shipment. They came off easily with a baby wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Krajewski

customer_reviews.title: Work well, not TOO solid.
customer_reviews.text: We use these for public events, and our volunteers prefer "the gold wrapper face paint crayons" over others and paint.
customer_reviews.author: Jill B

customer_reviews.title: Melted & Smushed:(
customer_reviews.text: It arrived broken and smushed. It’s as though it was exposed to heat, then jarred and jumbled. The tips are destroyed. Super disappointed. I was okay with my misunderstanding that they were larger, not okay with a melted product in broken casing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Agee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with a quarter of the crayons smashed to bits!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Application is good. Like a waxy crayon on your skin. Comes off with hot water and a wash cloth and little dedication.
customer_reviews.author: wisp588

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: My children were puppies for halloween and I was able to "paint" their entire faces easily with these crayons and I still have a lot left of the colors I used. The paint went on easily and came off with just a little water and face wash. it did get on my clothes a little from hugs but did not smear on their faces and stayed on all night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nieces for Christmas. They had a ball that night. They were all painted up going home.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Melted!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received product, package was sticky. And all crayons were melted! I absolutely need this by this weekend or else I would return.
customer_reviews.author: Ello

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: nice for face painting used for halloween nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: milos mom

product_meta.title: JOYIN 24 Colors Face Paint Safe & Non-Toxic Face and Body Crayons (Large Size 3 inch) Ultimate Party Pack Including 6 Metallic Colors for Birthday Halloween Makeup Party Suppiles
feature_bullets: Face Paint Includes 24 Vivi Assorted Colors Makeup Face Paint Crayons. Crayon Size: 3 inches.

24 Bright Colors are Pure White, Light Gray, Bright Yellow, Autumn Orange, Rich Red, Rose Pink, Chartruese, Bright Green, Forest Green, Sky Blue, Ocean Blue, Deep Blue, Dusty Purple, Wine, Dark Red, Sienna Brown, Coffee, Pure Black, METALLIC Purple, METALLIC Gold, METALLIC Silver, METALLIC Red, METALLIC Green, METALLIC Blue.

Super Value Pack for Theater Performances. Perfect for Football Party Supplies, Halloween Makeup, Day of the Dead Facepaint Makeup Set, School & Church Events, Festivals, Birthday Parties, Party Favors, Cosplay, Football Events, Prime Sport, Masquerades or Kids Playing Pretend Play in Beauty Salon and Stage Play Face Make ups.
Easy On & Easy Off: Washable; simply Remove with Soap and Warm Water. No Scrubbing needed. Deluxe Set. Super Durable. Superior Quality.

CHILD SAFE: Non-Toxic. Meet US Toy Standard. Safety Test Approved. Fully Compliant with the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and Toy and Cosmetic Regulations. Paraben-Free. Suitable for Sensitive Skin: Joyin Toy Face Paints are formulated to be friendly to the Most Sensitive Skin and Fragrance Free.
